title: Is Biden the Stable Leadership You Voted For? Guest: Sasha Stone | 9/19/22
description:
Glenn debunks President Biden's misleading statements on inflation during his "60 Minutes" special and warns of the coming economic crisis already forming overseas. As the threat of nuclear war by Vladimir Putin continues to grow, the arrogant leadership of Biden puts America in greater danger. Glenn dives more into the upcoming economic collapse and the collapse of the American dollar due to the Biden administration's actions. Glenn talks to Sasha Stone, a lifelong Democrat who campaigned for Joe Biden, as she shares why she no longer supports the current president. Stu looks into the latest polling numbers as the midterms get closer. Glenn and Stu discuss the Republican-led Convention of States and where they stand in supporting the effort.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
